exists_simple_subobject:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/

theorem exists_simple_subobject {X : C} [artinian_object X] (h : ¬is_zero X) : ∃ Y : subobject X, simple (Y : C) :=
  by
  haveI : nontrivial (subobject X) := nontrivial_of_not_is_zero h
  haveI := isAtomic_of_orderBot_wellFounded_lt (artinian_object.subobject_lt_well_founded X)
  have := is_atomic.eq_bot_or_exists_atom_le («expr⊤» : subobject X)
  obtain ⟨Y, s⟩ := (is_atomic.eq_bot_or_exists_atom_le («expr⊤» : subobject X)).resolve_left top_ne_bot
  exact ⟨Y, (subobject_simple_iff_is_atom _).mpr s.1⟩
#align exists_simple_subobject exists_simple_subobject
